Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_n03gi8f9R61rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/a6107461a0c93b5bad2027ad07f498b1/tumblr_inline_n03gzd8bse1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p><strong>qfeys</strong>'s <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67270-Throttle-Controlled-Avionics-1-1-0-23"><strong>Throttle Controlled Avionics</strong></a> allows you to tweak the throttle of individual engines. Use more control and earn a more centered thrust, all while letting your imagination run wild with ships you may not have deemed successful in the past - much like the unbalanced VTOL in the picture above.</p>

<p>For more info on <strong>Throttle Controlled Avionics</strong>, click <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67270-Throttle-Controlled-Avionics-1-1-0-23"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>

just had a quick try.....gorgeous! Even down to jettisoning 1 of 4 side mounted engines, the craft veered slightly off course and the opposite engine started to feather its throttle to maintain control of the ship......

Does what is says on the box! Brilliant mod

Running with B9, Interstellar, KAS, RCSBuildAid, Kerbal Alarm Clock & UniverseReplacer.........no crash as of yet
